messages.title: Change that works for you
messages.content: It's time for a Lib Dem MP in Southampton Test. Your hard-working local champion.

messages.title: Help the Lib Dems Win
messages.content: With your support, we can win in Southampton Test. Vote DAVID CALLAGHAN on [election date].

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Pledges to fix roads and improve local transportation.
Calls for honesty on NHS, fighting hospital infections, and pledges support for local health services.
Promises fair taxes that put money back into the pockets of ordinary people.
Committed to eco-friendly initiatives and actions against climate change.

mentions.tacticalSituation: With your support, we can win in Southampton Test.

issues.economy: Fairer taxes that put money back into the pocket.
issues.environment: Cleaner environment. Action against climate change.
issues.health: Local health services. Calls for honesty on NHS, fighting hospital infections.

politicalExperience.achievements: Fixing roads, working with local people to improve the area.
